about.heading: Behind the Code
about.bio: I am Mateus Felipe, a Full-Stack Developer crafting digital experiences since 2019. Born in the digital age (2007), I merge youthful innovation with robust technical expertise. My mission is to build systems that are not just functional, but works of art.

p1.title: Inventory System
p1.desc: Inventory system for product and warehouse management, built for a university. I used React.js, Node.js, Electron.js, and Postgres.

p2.title: Aprovados Club - AI-powered Study Platform
p2.desc: A Google Notebook-style study platform, AI integration, mind map creation, summary audios, chat conversation and history, organization in folders and tags, gamification.

p3.title: Hotel Booking Scheduling System
p3.desc: A system for organizing and structuring accommodation bookings for a hotel. Built with Next.js, Node.js, MySQL, and other technologies.

p4.title: Login Automation Tool
p4.desc: Login automation system for websites, made for scrapers.

p5.title: Papa Filas - Queue Ticket System integrated with a Printer
p5.desc: The system, for ticket withdrawal totem and attendants, was built for a university. I used React.js with Electron.js, Node.js, and Postgres. The system was integrated with an EPSON TM-T20X printer for ticket printing.

p6.title: System for Escort Girls
p6.desc: A system similar to Fatal Model and Photo Acompanhante. Fully functional, with photo uploading, chat, payment for 'ads', and so on. Built with Next.js, Node.Js, and Postgres.

timeline.heading: My Professional Journey
timeline.subheading: A timeline of my key experiences, projects, and milestones.

t1.title: Senior Software Engineer
t1.desc: Leading development of scalable web applications, mentoring junior engineers, and driving architectural decisions for next-gen products.

t2.title: Lead on Project Phoenix
t2.desc: Developed and launched a full-stack SaaS application for project management, utilizing React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.

t3.title: Software Engineer
t3.desc: Contributed to core product features, improving application performance by 20% and participating in a full agile development lifecycle.

t4.title: B.S. in Computer Science
t4.desc: Graduated with honors. Focused on algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles. President of the Coding Club.
